reviewText: A wonderful trip back into the life of Yiddish people in Brooklyn, the soul music of Jews from eastern europe- Mr Mendelson is the cat's meow of Chazanuht singing- What a voice what a mensch!

I saw this several years ago. It's the story of the Cantor and the friends he grew up with and his involvement in teaching  cantorial students in the old art of cantorial singing. A beautiful trip down memory lsne

This film documentary, biography, is a must see for anyone who appreciates anything Jewish.
One of the great lines in the film, very appropriate for the film "meeting Jacky Mendelssohn, is a happening" yes, it truly is.
The film is a lot of fun, there are some beautiful Cantorial phrases interwoven into the story.
